mapper.select: SELECT m.*, b.BRANCH_NAME, l.LOCAL_NAME FROM MEMBER m INNER JOIN branch b ON m.BRANCH_NO = b.BRANCH_NO INNER JOIN LOCAL l ON l.LOCAL_NO = b.LOCAL_NO ORDER BY b.branch_no DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET member_point = member_point + #{point_his_score} WHERE member_no = #{member_no}
UPDATE member SET member_point = member_point - #{point_his_score} WHERE member_no = #{member_no}
